name: Whack The Infected
description: The town of Townsvillage, once the calm destination of all passerby's, has been ravaged by the spread of a dangerous and viral disease. To cope with such a horrific event, the president of Townsvillage instilled new rules forcing anyone who is sick to stay at home. Whack The Infected is a game in which your goal is to whack the reckless infected villagers of Townsvillage in order to send them back home and prevent the virus from spreading. Be careful! If you whack the wrong people, your Abuse-O-Meter will surge, and if abused too much, you might lose your fun job!
